title: Hot Property: High-tech $3M escape on the lake
text: Hot Property: High-tech $3M escape on the lake Maureen C. Gilmer , maureen.gilmer@indystar.com Published 11:05 a.m. ET Feb. 24, 2017 | Updated 3 hours ago Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. The 8,500-square-foot home on Lake Monroe was built in 2016. It’s on the market for nearly $3 million. Provided by Encore Sotheby’s International Realty An infinity-edge pool off the living room includes waterfalls.
